categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens actors

nodes.text: Mark Pickup is a DJ from Southport, England, who is one half of electronic act Arcade 82, he portrayed an unidentified Jakku scavenger in Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens. His wife Mel Pickup portrayed Athgar Heece in the same movie. They are the first husband and wife to appear in the same Star Wars movie.[source?]
